availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Jane Gaines. Merchant in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Henry County in 1860. Employed Amanda Williams as a domestic in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 378B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 23.
"Merritt Gaines(1821-1902)," Find A Grave, Memorial #17852286, accessed June 28, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/17852286.
